name: Viewing attachments with invalid URL does not cause the application to crash

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)

inline.description:
1. Incoming Webhooks — Viewing attachments with invalid URL does not cause the application to crash
    –––––––––––––––––––––––––
    1. Edit the incoming webhook you created In Mattermost:
      1. Uncheck the box next to "Lock to this channel"
      2. Click 'Update'
      3. Replace the existing payload text with the text shown in the test data field
      4. Send it
      5. View it on the mobile app as well as webapp
inline.testData: {"channel": "off-topic", "username": "new_username", "text": "The image below should be broken due to the invalid URL in the payload text you just sent using Postman \n", "attachments":[{"image_url":"https://example.com"}], "icon_url": "http://www.mattermost.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/icon_WS.png"}
inline.expectedResult:
• The post can be viewed in the client without causing other issues. (The mobile app does not crash)
  • The image is broken as expected (invalid URL)

customFields.Related ticket(s): RN: Viewing a message attachment with an invalid image URL causes the app to crash — MM-14669
